short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find out if a plant is native to VA.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows a user to select a scientific name, common name, or synonyms on a website and search the Digital Atlas of the Virginia Flora website based on the selected text. It also allows for searching of the USDA Invasive Species Information Center website. 

This extension is not affiliated with, nor endorsed by, the Digital Atlas of the Virginia Flora, the Flora of Virginia Project, the Virginia Botanical Association, or the USDA.
